Senior Android Engineer (Remote, Europe only)
job.description:
Description Join us as we get ready to bring crypto's benefits to millions more people. You'll play a vital part by delivering outstanding UX and unrivalled security. This will draw on your experience building top-tier apps that you're proud of, quickly shipping features, and taking ownership of the entire development lifecycle. Requirements
  • 5 years experience building top tier Android apps, minimum 2 years in Kotlin
  • Strong computer science fundamentals
  • Focused on delivering great UX

Expert knowledge of:

  • RxJava usage (minimum 2 years of experience)
  • The Android framework: lifecycles, memory management, Gradle
  • Network protocols and data persistence techniques

Experience with:

  • Common Android libraries such as Retrofit, Room, Glide, and Dagger.
  • Testing Android apps with unit tests and UI tests
  • Continuous Integration and source control
  • Implementing security best practices for safeguarding data on a mobile device

The app

The Argent app is written mostly in Kotlin. We use RxJava extensively as it helps us to work with concurrency issues and react to changes as soon as they happen. We also use proven libraries like Glide, Retrofit, Lottie and the latest AndroidX libraries.

Benefits
  • Work remotely - anywhere in Europe (but Europe only). No commute. Lots of flexibility. Plenty of time to care for your kids or cats.
  • Equity in a high growth startup backed by the investors of Spotify and Slack.
  • Autonomy - you decide how to achieve your best work.
  • Trips across Europe - for one week every three months we collaborate in person, explore new solutions and have fun. So far we’ve stayed in Nice, Toulouse, Brussels, Lisbon and Barcelona. We'll resume these when safe following COVID.
  • Equipment - pick the tech setup of your choice.
  • Parental leave - generous package for new parents.
  • Build a new industry - help define the future of the web.

Our values

You can find more information on each of our values here.

job.title: Senior iOS Engineer (Remote, Europe only)
job.description:
Description

Join us as we get ready to bring crypto's benefits to millions more people. You'll play a vital part by delivering outstanding UX and unrivalled security. This will draw on your experience building top-tier apps that you're proud of, quickly shipping features, and taking ownership of the entire development lifecycle.

Requirements
  • 5 years experience building top tier iOS apps, minimum 3 years in Swift
  • Strong computer science and security fundamentals
  • Focused on delivering great UX

Expert knowledge of:

  • The Apple ecosystem - everything from UIKit animation and navigation stacks down to Keychain and Operation Queues
  • Debugging iOS apps - memory management, object lifecycle, view hierarchy
  • Network protocols and data persistence techniques

Experience with:

  • Testing iOS apps with unit tests and UI tests
  • Implementing different design patterns (i.e. Composable Architecture, Combine, Redux, MVVM)
  • Implementing security best practices for safeguarding data on a mobile device
  • Continuous integration and source control, App Store Connect, Certificates & Entitlements

The app

The Argent app is 100% Swift. We use our own open source web3.swift library for communicating with the Ethereum blockchain. Our latest updates target iOS14+ so we are working with the latest frameworks.

Benefits
  • Work remotely - anywhere in Europe (but Europe only). No commute. Lots of flexibility. Plenty of time to care for your kids or cats.
  • Equity in a high growth startup backed by the investors of Spotify and Slack.
  • Autonomy - you decide how to achieve your best work.
